RT @Sara_Conway3: @EnvAgencySE @BarnetCouncil @CRTSouthEast Thanks. The trash traps need looking at as this happens close by. Litter is obv…

@EnvAgencySE @BarnetCouncil @CRTSouthEast Thanks. The trash traps need looking at as this happens close by. Litter is obv an issue but the extent of the fly-tipping of large items in the wider area is almost unbelievable. A joined-up approach of collective responsibility and action is long overdue. https://t.co/5B277sIMyS

@CranfordAction @FriendsRivCrane @GuyLambert @CVP_CraneValley @CanLager @HestonActionG @EnvAgency @LlangattockPick So sad it was all there in the first place, but what you have all done is absolutely incredible. text: @PJennings88 @RiverChess @EnvAgency Local council collected samples from pipe discharging onto our land.  Recorded dry weather for some samples (didn't rain on the day/day before).  They had no understanding of the volume of groundwater entering the pipe/sewage chambers and the dilution effect (we live on a hill)🙄

urls.title: Get a personal wellbeing report free via your smart phone | Canal & River Trust
urls.description: Do you feel happier when you’re in green space? Does listening to birdsong lift your spirits? We’re launching our largest ever citizen science project to record the benefits of being beside water, and we’d like you to join in as well.

text: Well. Well! Well? #CitizenScience project @CanalRiverTrust is seeking volunteers to monitor how being by water affects wellbeing using the #UrbanMind app HT @EnvAgency  https://t.co/Z76PrnYnK9

@222_BunnyGreene @BorisJohnson @theFOALGroup @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @AnimalAid Probably because most people in parliament think hunting our wildlife is some kind of 'sport' when the majority of the population know it's sick and twisted. #keeptheban #enforcetheban #stophunting #forthewild.
